Put Amaretto in bottom of shot glass, top with Rum. Pour Beer into glass. Light shot, pick up shot by the sides and drop entire shot glass (bottom first) into beer. When bottom of shot glass hits bottom of beer glass chug (the beer will put out the flame).
Put all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, strain into a collin's glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Mix all ingredients over ice in large Shaker. Add more juice to taste for the lightweights. Shake well and strain into shot glass. This recipe may be doubled or quadrupled. We strongly encourage this. Enjoy!!

Put pineapple in the blender and blend (duh) till smooth. Add vodka, rum, and enough ice to raise the level to five cups. Blend until the ice gets all smashed up. Pour into tall glasses; garnish with the cherry. Drink until YOU get all smashed up.
Mix vodkas in a cocktail shaker over ice. Strain into shot glasses. Squeeze juice from the lemon wedge into each glass.
Serve over ice

Fill a rocker glsa with ice add the Coca-Cola then the schnapps

Mix everything in a highballglas and add some ice.
Combine in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into cocktail glass.
Pour all ingredients into pint glass.
Shake it with ice, and serve it in a cocktail glass.
Pour Butterscotch Schnapps halfway in shot glass. Pour Cream Whiskey down the side of the glass to fill the shot the rest of the way . Object is to float the Irish Cream on the Schnapps
Fill a short glass with ice. Pour the Cuervo into glass until about half full (more if you like it like I do). Top off with the Orange Juice. Squeeze a slice of lime into the drink. Enjoy!

Shake with plenty of ice, pour into Hurricaine glasses. Grind a moderate amount of green cardomom on top. (This is extremely important, and gives the drink it's characteristic purfume.) Garnish with fruit, a frilly umbrella, etc.

Mix Vodka and Juice in a any kind of bottle.
Fill Collins Class with Ice. Add all the white alcohol. Add the sour mix. Top off glass with Razzmatazz or Chambourd. Then shake to mix contents. A fruity version of a Long Island Iced Tea
to consume: place sugar on lemon, place in mouth and take shot, then bite down on lemon -enjoy sweet/tart flavor as vodka goes down! YummY!

drinks.strDrink: Sex under the bleachers with a KU cheerleader
drinks.strInstructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients and kiwi in blender, then add the food coloring and stir. Pour into glass and top with cherry.

Fill 12 oz. glass with ice. Add all the alcohol and sour mix. Top off glass with pineapple juice to taste then watch out.
put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.

Fill half beer glass with beer. Fill other half with 7-UP soda (If you have the patience, pour a little of one, then a little of the other, until the glass is full). Fill a shot glass with Melon liqueur. Drop entire shot glass into glass of beer. Immediately drink entire pint of beer with shot glass still inside (do not swallow the shot glass).
The amount of ingredients can vary depending upon the size of the punch bowl,
Mix all ingredients together in a blender or mix in a bowl with a whisk until fully blended.

take seeds out of cardamom pods, put the seeds and the rest of the spices (1-4) in cheesecloth bag. combine 1qt port, 1qt red wine, raisins and spice bag, simmer for 15-20 minutes. add remaining port, red wine and almonds, heat through (but not hot enough to evaporate remaining alcohol). In another pan, mix sugar with 1/3 of the brandy, light brandy on fire and melt sugar. When sugar is melted add remaining brandy. Then combine with the wine/port mixture. Drink!!!
Pour into shot glass and shoot it back.
Place 3/4 oz. of whiskey in an old-fashioned glass. Add 2.5 oz. of optinally warmed Canadian Apple Cider. If served cold, crushed ice is optional.
Poor shots into glass. Fill with Dr. Pepper or Mt. Dew and mix. Enjoy.
Put cranberry juice in punch bowl. Add apple cider/juice and apple juice brandy to taste. Slice apple in 3/16th
Pour first three ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange or pinapple juice, stir well, and serve.
Layer Galliano, then hot coffee, then cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of nutmeg.
boil water and whisky in seprate glasses, ignite whisky, slowly mix whisky and water 4-6 times
Add ice to glass. Fill 2/3 of the way up with Tanqueray Gin, and the remaining 1/3 with tonic water. Add lime.
fill glass with ice. Add each liquor, then pour sour mix to top. stir. splash of 7up or sprite.
fill glass with ice. pour butterscotch scnapps and bailey's into glass. fill with milk. shake. serve with sip straw.

shake all ingredients adding less or more orange juice for you preferance of taste. serve in shot glass.

First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).
Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir
Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.

Add the orange juice in the glass so it fills it about 1/3. Then take a napkin and put it over the glass pushing it down toward the juice. Push napkin down as far as it can go without touching the juice. Next pour the vodka very slowly so it dribbles on top of the juice. This will create a layer of vodka that lays on top of the juice because of the different densities of the liquids.
pour 1 oz of goldshlager shapps then pour in the baileys. This is a layered drink with the baileys on the bottom. Garnish with a nut in the middle of the drink.
Put all into a Shot Glass
In a ice filled mixing cup add all ingredients and shake well, pour into cocktail glass, garnish with berries in season
pour very cold tequila with Benedictine in a shot glass.You serve it with a slice of orange that has cinnamon on it nad kalo methisi(that was Greek)
Mix all liquors and sweet and sour and top off with Pepsi Cola. Stir and Serve with a Lemon wheel.

Add all ingredients to blender including one mint leaf as it will be blended up and leave little specks at top of drink. After drink is complete add other whole mint leaves. A lime wedge can also be added. Amount of soda water should fluxuate according to how strong the lemon-lime solution is.
Pour in the brandy and then the coke, biatch. Hold up the glass and say dude. Enjoy dude.

In a pitcher add one can of beer. Next add one can of frozen pink lemonade. Note: do not mix the lemonade with water. Finally use the empty lemonade container to measure and add the vodka. Stir and enjoy.
Pour Orange curacao into champagne flute, add Dark rum, top off with Champagne, I recommend Brut

With the shot glass you pour half a glass with Tequila and the other half with 7-up. Take the glass already filled with both drinks, take it with palm holding the top of the glass (so the liquid would not come out) and you hit to the table so it will stirr, and you drink the whole.

Pour contents in shaker over ice and shake well. Pour into glass. This is a big shooter so you have to use a small rocks glass.

Start with sugar in the empty glass. Next pour in the whiskey, followed by the coffee. Stir till sugar is disolved, let mixture settle. Float whipped cream on top. Curl up in front of the fireplace with J. Joyce and enjoy!
Just like making a milk shake, but add the Kahlua. This drink is very rich, but it tastes great. We invented it one summer day!!
pour 1 shot a vodka pour 1/2 shot of Tobasco sauce in seperate shot glass (take vodka shot immediately followed by the Tobasco shot) ***amount can be changed to liking
Pour 2 cl of gin (no special gin required) in a glass. Add 2 cl of Malibu. On top of that, enough of Rose'e lime juice to match the taste of Malibu. Fill up with lemonade. Add some ice and a straw.
By adding the steamed milk last, the ingredients mix well. Make sure to stir all of the chocolate from the bottom of glass.
Take 1 part Vodka and shake well with 1 part of Best beer you know.
Always put ice in glass first to cool the mixers when they are poured.
In a large container, fill half way with ice. Pour in all contents and mix well. You are ready to serve.
Stir together and serve over ice

mix in shaker, serve over lots of ice

Add the 2 rums and vodka together in a beer mug. Then add the other 2 ingredients to it. Then top off the beer mug with lemonade.
Mix in glass and enjoy
Shake and serve.

Stud the strips of orange and lemon peel with 2 cloves each and place them in a frying pan or chafing dish with the stick of cinnamon and the 2 teaspoons of sugar. Place over moderate heat, stirring occationally with a wooden spoon, until the sugar has melted. Pour the Irish Whiskey into the pan and light a match to the liquid. (Be sure to step back since the flame will flare up instantly.) Shake the pan to and fro slowly until the flame dies out. Pour in the hot coffee all at once and let it come to a simmer. Remove from the heat. Rub the cut edge of a strip of lemon peel around the inside of each the irish coffee cup and dip it into a dish of caster sugar so that the sugar adheres to the inside rim. Pour in the coffee, trying not to disturb the sugar. Top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream.

Fill tall glass with ice. Pour Coca-Cola into glass. Add amaretto and stir. Drink with straw.
dump it in a glass of ice and enjoy
Mix well, add ice last. Serves two normal people or one alcoholic.
Pour the Pisang Ambon into a glass, of the approx. size 1 dl. Slowly pour the OJ into the liquor. No stirring... Enjoy !

Add aquavite and Charleston Follies and stir it with ice. Add lime and tonic water. Fresh up with slice of lemon and red cocktail berry.
pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

Funny how the program wouldn't let me post this without adding mixing instructions. There are so many ways to get hold of it. You can draw it, pour it, dig for it or simply dig it, you can get it from a well, a tap, a source, a fountain, a stream, you can drink it straight up, out of your hand, from a glass, a bottle, a jar and a container. Soft water may have the disadvantage of containing only minute quantities of magnesium, whereas hard water might be bad for your favourite sweat-shirt... But all in all, NO WATER - NO LIFE. So get a life, care for your water.

Just mix all in equal portions. Its good!
Mix all ingredients in a pitcher. Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available, the bigger the better! This drink packs a big punch, so don't over do it.
Shake vodka, Cointreau and juice of a lemon wedge well with plenty of ice. Strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon zest.
Mix the ingredients, add a couple of ice cubes. Put a slice of orange or lemon (any fruit will do!) on the rim of the glass.
Put all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake it well. Serve in a red wine glass and add in the top a bit of powdered cinnamon .
Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.
Mix, pour over ice and top up with Bitter Lemon.
Put all in a Shacker with Ice, shake it for a while and serve in a cold Cocktail glass
Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

Get a large glass, (any glass but it must be large) Start from the top of the list and work your way down stirring each time you add an ingredient. When you've finished you need not do anything else just drink it.
Mix everything together and add some crunched ice and olives!
Put in the Vokda first then the Tropical Schnapps then add the OJ and the Cranberry Juice.
chill and strain into a shot glass
Shake ingredient vodka, lime and sugar with shaker. Add soda. Pour into Beer-pilsner with Ice. Drop curacao and creme de menthe. Decorate with cut-lime and cherry.
Mix all the ingredients besides the ice in a large pitcher (or several smaller). Once thoroughly mixed, add the ice and serve in wine glasses.

Into pilsner glass filled with ice cubes, first pour the melon liqueur, then the tequila, to create a green layer. Add sour mix. Slowly pour orange juice against side of glass to create the yellow layer. Add a few more ice cubes, if needed. Carefully float the sloe gin on top for the red layer. Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime wheels. Stir just before drinking.
Pour Chartreuse into shot glass, and dash the Tabasco in. More Tabasco for a more venomous bite!
Add the coffe first , then add alchohol and finally you should add the sugar. Shake well :c)
Pour Jager at bottom of glass. Mix Crown, Everclear, & 151 separately to layer on top of the Jager. Splash the Grenadine. Attempt to shoot & SHUT THE HELL UP.

drinks.strDrink: Sloe comfortable screw against the wall
drinks.strInstructions: Shot of Sloe Gin, add half ounce Southern Comfort, fill with orange juice, float Galliano.

Fill shot glass with schnapps. Fill tumbler about 3/4 full of beer. Place filled shot glass upright in filled tumbler. Beer should be just short of covering top of shot glass. Just before drinking, cover entire drink with hand and slam on table or bar. Drink all at once.
Mix all ing. over ice, strain and serve! Tastes like a sweet tart!
Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.
Chill & strain.
Pour the shit in a beer mug, mix, and enjoy.
pour alchol into glass and fill with equal parts of juices and sour mix add ice and enjoy!
Shake. Garnish with cut apple, lemon, pineapple-leaves.
Stir. No garnish.
Pour whiskey generously over ice, add grapefruit juice (preferably unsweetened).
Over Ice. Stir, dont shake.
Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker, then shake, and pour into glass. Add lime.
Pour in Vodka, then fill with the orange juice. Add the amaretto which should mostly sink to the bottom. Splash in some grenadine to cloud the center of the drink. Serve without mixing or stirring.
Stir Vodka and Grenadine with ice. Fill in Champagne-flute without the ice. Fill up with champagne.
Make fresh homemade lemonade by mixing the juice of one lemon and 8 oz. (one glass) of water. Be sure not to add sugar. Add the vodka and stir then put in the ice.
mix all ingredients in glass and enjoy!!
Pour the vodka and anisette into the glass and top it off with orange juice.

Fill vodka and Pisang in the glas. If you tihnk it's to strong you may fill in with more pisang. Fill then with orange juice and sprite, about half of each till the glas is filled. Take then a twist or two of lemon.
Add ingredients to a tumbler with ice. Shake well. Pour into snifter, ice included.
Combine Creme de Banana, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice & ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Strain over ice and float Midori. Garnish with watermelon wedge.
Put the ice cubes in first then add the shots in the order that they're listed.

Mix all ingredients in a collins glass over ice (if a 32 oz. glass is available double all the ingredients), mix in a shaker and serve with a cherry. Should taste like the old chalky lollipops that cam on a hard plastic stem!!!!

Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.
Mix Rumple Minze and Jägermeister in an iced shaker and strain into shot glass
Place The Creme de menthe in a shot glass, using a tea spoon carefully float the Black Sambuca on top.
Put double of Creme de Menthe in a 10-12 oz (300-350ml) glass and fill to top with Ginger Ale, Tonic, or Soda Water.
Fill the glass about two thirds full of Sprite. Pour in the Schnapps, then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.
Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!
Ice first, then the Gin (use high quality like Beefeeter). Then pour on the lime juice (use a sweet brand like Hearts) and the fill upp the class with ginger ale.

Pour tequila, peach schnapps, and sweet & sour over ice. Add grenadine and stir slightly. The drink should fade from yellow to red. You can also put ingredients in a blender with ice for a frozen version.
Pour tequila, Cointreau, and sweet & sour over crushed ice. Add lime juice. Can be made frozen by putting in a blender with 3 cups ice.
Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake, strain into shot glass. The amount of milk is optional depending on desired potancy of shot.
This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top
Add 4 ice cubes to old-fashioned glass. Pour 2 ounces of vodka over the ice. Add 15 dashes of peychaud bitters. Stir.
Fill a pint glass with ice. Add one shot each of Bacardi Black Rum and Seagram's Extra Dry Gin. Add a splash of soda water and fill the rest of the glass with sweet & sour mix.

First you mix the alcohol into the glass with ice in it. Next you pour Sprite and Farris at the same time into the glas. At last you the drops from lime comes and you serve it with a slice of lime on the side.
Pour Coke in, then orange juice, then vodka. Stir it about a bit, then add cordial. Enjoy !
Add ice to glass, pour in Kahlua, fill with orange juice. Stir.
Mix. Pretend it's a martini. Plastic glasses are the best for this beast.
Mix the 2 half gallons of each in a large enough container, chill in the freezer for a maximum of 1 hour.

There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.
Mix alcohol, then juice and tonic water. Add crushed ice and drink.
Fill the glass with Tequila then add Tabasco sauce carfully, put on a top with whipped cream and add some salt on it.
Basically, toss the Rum & Vodka together and stir gently. Next, pour in the orange juice . Shake well. Pour over ice.

Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1/1/2 oz. of peach scnapps. Then fill the glass about 1/2 full with o.j. Next fill the rest of the glass with 7-up or Sprite. Top the drink off with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a flag.
Mix tequila and kahlua in a whiskey glass and serve with lotsa ice...
Put the two shots into frosty beer mug. Add IBC Root Beer into glass. Ice cubes are optional.

Blend the Absolut kurant, Oregat and Frangelico in a mixer. Pour in highball glass, add 2 icecubes, fill with the cranberryjuice and sprite. Put a slice of lemon on the edge of the glass. Optional to add a dash of lime for an even fresher taste.
Put ice in glass Pour in vodka Add splash of Sour Mix Half fill with cola Half fill with 7-Up Roll drink to remove fizz Drink!
Just put the ingredients in a shot glass and put a little bit of whipped cream on the top.
Throw it all together and have fun. Adjust sour mix for a stiffer or weaker drink.
Mix as normal, pour in shot glass, and set on fire. Put it out any way you want.
Fill glass with Icecubes, pour all ingrediences into glass. Garnish with orange slice.
Put the tabasco sauce in the bottom of a shot glass, pour equal parts Absolut Peppar and Everclear 190 then add salt. Set on fire and serve.
Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !
blend ice and ice-cream in the blender until smooth. add liquers and continue blending until smooth. if needed add more ice-cream to acheive milk shake type consistency.
Into a mason jar filled with cracked ice, pour 6 oz Canadian Whisky and 3 oz Sweetened lime juice. Stir with a fork.
Crush the two pieces of candy until they are pulverised. Pour the vodka into the shot glass before adding the powder. Stir it until the candy has dissolved in the liquor.
Add 1.5 oz. Absolut Vodka to 10 oz. cocktail glass filled with ice, top off with Coka-Cola.
Mix in the lemonade with the Bacardi Limon. If it is a good lemonade you're using you can mix as much as half & half and not be able to taste the rum.
Pour the Irish Cream into a highballglass. Pour the Fanta over it and watch as it explodes

Put in punch first, then add everclear. For added flavor, soak the fruit wedges in everclear about an hour ahead of time. Fruit wedges make excellent snack. Best served in ice chest or jantorial trash can for mass comsumption.
Blend all ingredients with ice. Serve in Margarita glass on rocks.
Shake with ice in cocktail shaker. Strain into cocktail glass.
shake with ice. pour into glass.

Mix together in a double shot glass. Light on fire. Let the flames warm the concoction about 20 secs. Blow out fire. Swallow quickly. Be careful as the glass may be hot. Now lay on the ground, put your claws in the air, and "wrestle with the dragon".
Pour all ingredients into a glass (larger than 12 oz.). Put a lid over the glass. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds.
just mix, shake and pour.

This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!
Shake & Strain.
Put all ingredients in shaker together with some ice-cubes. Shake well. Serve with piece of banana on top of the glass.
Pour the beer into the pint glass. Add the lime juice and the Hooch. Stir with a spoon or something like that. Enjoy!
Pour 2 cl Galliano into a shot glass, float 2cl hot filter coffee over it and top with lightly thickened cream as to create three layers.
Mix. Then drink. Repeat as necessary.
layer in order given, splash 151 on top light on fire, sprinkle cinnamon on top to produce sparks instead of just a flame
Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain into glass.

Shake tequila, triple sec, sweet & sour, cranberry juice, and lime juice in a pint glass. Rim another pint glass with salt and transfer contents. Float the Gran Marnier, garnish with a lime and straw, and serve.
Crush the cherries in the glass and mix it with the other ingrediences
Poor Tequila in a glass, fill in with cream, stir.
shake vigorously
mix in shaker over ice...strain into glass(es)
Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

fill up the shaker with ice and put the ingredience in it. Shake it until it gets frosty on the outside. Before you start shaking,put icecubes in the glass and fill it up with water so the glass is cold when you have shaked the drink. Take the icecubes and water out of the glass,and fill the glass again vith icecubes and pour the drink in the glass.
put alchohol in shot glass, drop strawberry into glass, then try and make cream float on top.
pour all spirits in the shaker ... & top with a splash of pineapple juice
Pour vodka, gin and creme-de-menthe over lots of ice.
Place all ingredients in a blender. Mix until smooth. Garnish with fresh of frozen berries.
Mix in blender until smooth. Garnish with slice of orange.
Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.
combine ingredients in mug and stir until fizzy
In a highball glass, combine Gin and Chambord over ice. Stir. Add two Italian green olives and fill with tonic water. Garnish with lime wedge.

Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass . Add the 2 HEAPING shots of Absolute Vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of Absolute as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with the Arizona Icetea with lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!
Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!
Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.
Chill rum. Then layer. Creme de Banana first, then Bailey's and float rum on top.

In a large juice or water pitcher filled with ice cubes, pour equal parts pineapple juice and Jack Daniels. Stir, then add a splash of grenadine to give the mixture a pink, almost watermelon, tint. Stir until well chilled. Pour into shot glass, straining ice, and enjoy.
Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.
This drink can be mixed with ice added, or put into a blender with ice, to be crushed. I like it on ice.
fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.
Shake ingredients with ice. Strain. Serve as a shooter.
Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.
Pour in Rum and then triple sec. Next pour in OJ and Pinapple. Grab that Gary.
combine all liquor in full glass of ice. shake well. garnish with orange and cherry
Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.
Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.
Hurricane glass filled with ice add ingredients shake cherry and orange garnish
Small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass
small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass
small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass
Collins glass filled with ice add ingredients up to sour mix shake fill with Jägermeister
Fill glass with ice and fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. DO NOT STIR!!!!! Serve well chilled.
Fill glass half way with ice. Add o.j. and Midori and give a little stir.
Add a few cubes of ice to glass and then add Midori and Bacardi. Fill the rest of the way with the soda and give a little stir.
Shake. Garnish with cinamon-powder, cherry, mint, lemon-peel
Shake. Garnish with red cherry
stir
Shake. Garnish with cherry, lemon-peel
shake.
Combine the water and lemonade mix, following the directions on the lemonade mix. Add everclear and absolute vodka. Then add the lemon slices and shake to mix. serve cold
Put in iced shaker and mix well, strain in to a Highball glass
Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.
shake ingredients and pour over ice...
Fill glass half way with vodka, fill rest of way with Zima. Then add the lime juice (Rose's Lime Juice works best). Now stir and add the slice of lime.
Mix vodka, whiskey and Bailey's. Add the coffea and the brown sugar. Blend.
Just mix them!!!
Pour an half ounce of Blue Curacao into shot glass. Follow with quarter of an ounce of Vodka. (Try and use Smirnoff) One table spoon of lime juice. Then fill rest of glass with sprite.
just pour the alcoholic ingridents in a shot glas and when you done that squeze a little amount of lime juice on top
Build all ingrediants in a collins glass, cover, shake and serve
Shake all ingredients and serve over ice. (crushed)
Mix each ingredient in a glass. Tilt glass 180 degrees and slam it!

Place whole eggs, in shell, (organic would be preferable) in a jar. Cover with lemon/lime juice. Seal the jar and refrigerate. Leave the eggs to marinate for 2-3 weeks. The shells should become soft. Place the eggs and juice in a blender and blend until smooth. Strain to remove egg membranes. Add sugar and pisco to taste.
Pour all ingredients into mixing cup with ice. Shake and strain into double shot glass. Drink soon after pouring before liquors separate.
Just Dump 'EM All In A Glass & Mix 'Em All Up.
Layer ingrediants in order listed above. Then squeeze lemon over layered ingrediants. Be sure to mount lemon wedge on side of glass or place in glass.

Pour Kahlua in shot glass then with a spoon slowly pour Irish Cream into the shot glass on top of the Kahlua then pour the 151 Rum with the Spoon slowly on top of the Irish Cream then light on fire.. Blow out Flame Before Drinking!
Mix it all over ice, strain into shot glass.
combine in sequence in shot glass, shoot!
1) Put all ingredients in mixing glass 2) Shake 3) Pour into coffee mug 4) Add sugar and cream if neccasary
1) Coat the lemon wedge with sugar 2) Douse the lemon wedge with the 6 dashes of tobasco 3) Fill the shot glass with pernod To administer this shot, suck the lemon and then shoot the pernod.
Put ice in bottom of glass. Slowly pour Baliey's Irish Cream over ice Next pour in milk and then stir gently. Add more to taste. For chocoholics add Hearshy's Chocolate sauce.
Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry.
Pour Goldschlagger into a shot glass. Add a splash of Tabasco sauce. Drink and run for water.
Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.
make it an ample size shot!!
Float Goldschlager on top of Rumple and enjoy!
Float schnapps on top of Rumple and enjoy!
put two scoops ice-cream in blender add liquor and blend until like a milk shake.
Mix in shot glass, it's that simple. Use more Tabasco for more fire, less for more alcohol.
serve with ice. fresh pressed juice tastes best.
combine with ice in shaker strain into cocktail glass
Place all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and serve over ice.
Put 1/3 chocolate syrup, then 1/3 Jägermeister, and then 1/3 Butterscotch of the glass.
Pour Midori into a hurricane glass over ice, add Vodka, Pineapple juice, then float cranberry juice.
Layer ingredients in above order in a shot glass. Light Bacardi 151 Rum, and serve.

Blend banana, coconut cream, and pineapple juice in blender and set aside. In bottom of hurricane glass, stir together both rums and strawberries. Pour banana/coconut/pineapple mix into glass slowly. The strawberry/rum mix should creep up the sides of the glass to make a wonderful looking (and tasting) summertime cocktail!
Add cranberry juice to gin and pour into shot glass.
Pour Chambord and Vodka over ice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Garnish with purple grape and pineapple slice.
Layer all ingredients and light on fire to warm. Blow out flame and drink in one gulp.

Fill the highball glass (or preferrably a 32oz glass) half way with crushed ice. Then add the shots of alcohol in this order: bacardi 151 rum, crown royal, and vanilla liqeur. Now pour one can of pepsi into the mixture. Finally, stir well with a barspoon, or any long spoon to evenly distribute the ingredients.
Fill highball glass(or preferably a 32 oz. glass) halfway with crushed ice. Add alcohol contents over ice. Pour coke over mixture. Mix well.

Add the three rums and the Midori in highball glass with ice. Add a little Sour mix for flavor and fill the rest with pineapple juice. It's a nice light green color. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.
Put them all together and mix it with a lot of ice. For big parties use more of each and mix in a garbage can.
small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

Mix all the ingredients, except for the 151 rum in a tin glass or shaker. Steam the snifter, using the 1/2oz. of 151 lighting it, until it consumes itself. After that pour the content of the shaker in the hot snifter. It will create a really good smelling cloud of smoke, that it's what distinguish this coktail.
Layer in order into a shot glass.
Serve over ice in a tall glass
Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well, pour into a tall cocktail glass and add a slice of lemon.
Put into mixing glass all of above. Mix well, pour into cocktail glass.
Put a shot of peppermint schnapps in your mouth. Do not swallow. Squirt chocolate (not too much!) into your mouth. Shake head vigorously and then swallow.
Fill highball glass with ice, add the blue curacao, add the tequila and finally for that yummy green color, fill the glass with the orange juice.
Take the glass and rub the edge on a lemon, then dip the rim in sugar. Drop the ice cubes into the glass, pour a 1/3 liqueur and fill it up with Sprite. Stir.
Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of lemon.
Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of orange.
Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of orange.
Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with cherries.
Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.
151 first, then Rumple Minze
Shake with ice, strain and serve in a chilled cocktail glass, on on the rocks in an Old-fashioned glass. Granish with maraschino cherry.
Blend Pisang Ambon, Peach Tree, Malibu and lemon squash together in a blender. Put ice cubes in the glas and pour the mix over. Fill up with Sprite, and add a drop of blue syrup. Stir and serve.
Mix in shot glass in order of appearance in ingredients list.
Pour rum and cranberry juice into a tall glass. Slowly add Sprite, stopping immediately when the color changes from red to pink.
Just pour it in
Put Coaca mix in the mug fill half way with hot water - stir. Pour in Southern Comfort, peppermint schnapps and Bailey's - stir. Top off with hot water. Top with whipped cream (optional) .
Combine the shots in a 'collins' glass. Fill the rest of the glass 3/4 full with Coke. Add crushed ice.
Add 1/3 rum,1/3 vodka , and combine coca-cola and orange juice to fill glass. Add ice if you have room!
In a shot glass pour in apple brandy first, then Goldschlager, then Captain Morgan's. Shoot!
pour into a tall glass over ice, shake to mix all ingredients well, garnish with a cherry or an orange slice if you so desire
Pour in hard liquors first and lime juice follows. Top with beer until full. Do not stir. Enjoy!!
Pour ingredients over ice filled glass and shake or stir to mix and then strain.
Mix all ingredients in hurricane glass.
Combine all ingredients in glass
Make hot chocolate (preferably using water) according to instructions. Mix in Rumple Minze and enjoy.
Mix vodka and orange- and pineapplejuice and pour over ice in a glass. Layer a little grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of orange.
Add rums over ice and fill glass with ice tea. Best in a tall frosty glass.
Fill mixing glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all ingerdients. Strain into a rocks glass.
Keep both bottles in the freezer. Pour vodka first to the 1 oz line. Pour in the schnapps, which will form a ball in the bottom of the glass.

Dissolve jello with 1 cup boiling water, add 1 cup vodka and srir, pour into shot glasses, ice trays, or in 1 oz plastic cups found at party supply stores (they even have little lids for them), chill until firm. Each person can use a knife or their tongue to loosen the edges of the jello and then suck them down. If you use the 1 oz plastic cups and lids you can serve them by placing all of the cups in a large bowl filled with ice...they will stay cold longer, and they look really festive! * Try making an assortment using several flavors of jello!
Shaken with ice and put in a pint glass and topped with lemonade.
Over ice mix equal parts of each alchohol. Top with the grapefruit juice. Shake to blend.
pour 2/3 of an oz. of each ingrediant into a shot glass and drink.
Combine shots of peach schnapps, vodka and malibu rum. Fill glass almost to top with pineapple juice and splash in cranberry juice for a touch o' color.
shake well with ice, pour strained mixture into shooter. Salute'
Mix all ingredients in a glass and add ice ! Enjoy!!
Heat milk. Add sugar. Add Kahlua. Nutmeg on top. Sleep tight.
Pour Rumple Minze into glass first, add Firewater
Pour vodka in medium-sized shot glass Add a mouthful of 2% milk Add a drop or two of grenadine Ice optional.
mix all on the rocks,shake,strain,and serve.

drinks.strDrink: Passed Out Naked on the Bathroom Floor
drinks.strInstructions: Pour each ingredient into the shot glass, in this order: Rumple Minze, Jägermeister, Jose Cuervo Gold Tequila, then Bacardi 151 Rum. No need to mix, it mixes fine in this order.

Fill glass with ice and pour Malibu, peach schnapps and 151 into glass. After putting the right amount of liquor put your juices on top and splash of grenadine. When you have all of that done take your shaker tin, fitting it on top of the glass and give it a couple of good shakes.
In a cazuela that is made of clay, put ice, salt, lime, orange, lemon, and grapefruit in cazuela then add granadine, and the tequila, then fill with Squirt, use a straw to stir.
Shake well. Serve in rocks glass
Poor shots into jar or glass and then poor can of dew in!! Mix well and enjoy!!!
Add ice and a cherry. Stir.
Start with the ice then you take the vodka then the liquor then the ginger ale
Add ice and stir. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries.
Mix Vodka, Amaretto, Tripple Sec and a 1/2 squeeze of Lemon wedge in a shaker with ice. Shake. Squeeze remaining lemon juice into Martini glass. Pour mixture into glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
First apply a alcohol into cup. Then add juices. Shake,shake, rattle and roll. Then put into cup with ice. Add cherries and lemons.
Pour Butterscotch Schnapps in a shot glass 3/4 of the way full. Fill rest of drink with Bailey's Irish Cream.
Rinse glass with Sherry, discard Sherry. Shake gin over ice in separate glass to chill. Fill rinsed glass with ice, pour chilled gin over ice. Garnish with lemon twist (optional).

First, pour the scotch in a shot glass, then pour the kirsch and amaretto. Add the Dubonnet rouge very carefully trying not to mix the ingredients. Finally pour the mint. Do not mix. Drink in one shot.
If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.
Mix the rum, grenadine, vermouth and angostura. Shake with ice. Add the olive.
Shake ingredients with ice, then strain into a shot glass.
Fill the glass to 2/3 with ice cubes. Shake the gin and lime and pour into the glass.
Mix with ice and strain in tall shot glass.
1 ounce of brandy mixed with a small cup of hot coffee then add a few drops of tobasco sause

Chill Tia Maria and Baileys Irish cream 20 degrees In shot glass fill half way with Tia Maria then very carefully add Bailey Irish cream on top. Do not allow them to mix. Keep them seperated. There's your shot. Enjoy!
Pour 2cl of Bailey's right in. Then pour the salmiac vodka in BUT don't let them mix into gray: there should be creamish white and also deep black visible in the drink, slightly mixed.
Add OJ, Cranberry juice, and Malibu into a mixing glass and pour into the highball glass.
Add your GM and then add your coffee.
build over ice in order

Take the Highball glass or anything that will hold 12 oz. of soda and pour the soda in the glass. Next take one shot of the Capt. Morgan and add it to the Dew. And finally add one shot of the Johnnie Walker red label to the mix. Stir it and enjoy.
Mix all ingredients in highball with ice and shake. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.
Mix all ingredients in a large (1/2 gallon) pitcher. Shake and enjoy!
Pour over ice into hurricane or parfait glass, stir. Garnish with orange peel.
To a glass of ice add Captain Morgan's spiced rum. Add a splash of tonic water. Rim glass with lime. Drink. Repeat.
Blend with ice and strained in to the cocktail glass and garnish whith a slice of lime and red cherry.
Pour tequila into shot glass. Next pour in Mountain Dew. Hold your hand over the top of the glass and slam it down. The shot will change color. Take the shot.
Combine all ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.
pour into shot glass, layering ingredients, from top to bottom light on fire and extinguish after 15 seconds.
In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients except club soda and cherry with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice cubes and fill with club soda. Stir, then add cherry.
Mix ingredients Chill over ice Strain into shot glass
Mix Tequila and Tabasco together, then put it in the shot glass. Now put 1 cl of rum ontop.
Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.
Put all ingredients in a blender, blend till smooth, should create a small frothy head. Pour into to any glass handy, and enjoy your milkshake!
Add the Everclear first and then the OJ so the OJ settles on the top. Then shoot it. Repeat.
mix everything except cola, sugar and ice in glass. then stir in sugar. then add ice cubes. finally, pour in cola. stir three times. drink.
Shake the gin and the schnapps together in ice. Pour into glass Dribble the chocalte syrup in a circle on the bottom of the glass. (do not mix)
Pour lager into beer mug or pint glass: add Kahlua. Stir.
Put all this together in a cup and pour into shot glasses, this obviously makes three shots. The Shots are ratios, the more the better.
Layer and stir, garnish with lemon
Shake Well and pour into glass enjoy

Place all 6 8oz jars of cherries (drained), mixed with EVERCLEAR into sealable cannister for approx. 2 and half months, serve by the shot. To drown out flavor of everclear, put one cherry in shot glass, and fill with sprite or 7up. Take cherry and soda into mouth at same time, chew cherry, and swallow all together. Enjoy!!
Fill glass with ice then pour ingrediants in order then stir.
Mix the black coffee with the Ouzo(until you can't feel the ouzo taste anymore) and put a little blob of whipped cream on top - Drink and enjoy...
Pour ingredients, Shake with Ice and serve with a straw. Garnish if desired with an Orange Slice.
Fill shot glass less than 1/2 full with blueberry schnapps, add same amount of raspberry schnapps. Slowly top off with grenadine. Dribble a small amount of Bailey's on top..
Just pour the vodka and the chocolate syrup together in a glass. Shake well. Then add the mixture of crushed ice and strawberries and voila'.
Pour one-third of Rumple Minze, Jägermeister, and Goldschlager into a shot glass
Pour both ingredients into shot glass. Consume Repeatedly
Poor ingredients over lots of ice.Garnish with slice of lime.
Shake all ingredients except coke.Poor over ice and top with coke for an extra creamy head. Serve with a straw on a sunny day.
Fill glass with ice. Add the ingredients in the order listed.
Mix the Aftershock with vodka, in no particular order.
Start with the gin, then fill up with the tonic water. And last, add the ginger ale.
Start with the gin, then fill up the glas with tonic water. And last, add the ginger ale.
pour apfelkorn in shotglas. slowly pour drops of baileys in center of shot finally add a few drops of grenadine.
Pour ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and top with a cherry. It tastes like a chocolate shake, but with a kick!

Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 oz. of Southern Comfort, 1 oz. of Amaretto, fill with Apple juice, do a short shake. While pouring the drink back in the glass add a splash of lime juice.
Mix all ingredients. Chill with ice and strain into a shooter glass!
Mix liquor togther. Add Cream. Shake Well. Strain & Serve
Mix all of the ingriedients together over ice,shake til very chilled and strain into two glasses.
Fill highball glass with ice. Pour curacao over ice then fill with milk.
Shake over ice
Layer in shot glass Yukon Jack, Jack Daniels and PeachTree Schnapps last
Shake all the ingridiens whith lots of ice. Stir in a Hurricane glas.

Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...
Shake the spirits with crushed ice in a shaker and pour in the cocktail glass. Fill with soda.

sit outside on balcony, fill glass with crushed ice, sqeeze lime, hold glass up to the sky (best effect during sunset), pour rum up to horizon , add some coke to cover the sky (no overflow), stir smoothly, lean back & ENJOY! Maximum effect with bass heavy dub reggae in the background
Pour both shots into same glass, add ice if want chilled, stir, and drink.
Combine Rum and Cranberry juice first. Add splash of Sunny D. May drink with crushed ice, if prefered.

Stir with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.strDrink: Ken and Kirsten's top shelf Margarita
drinks.strInstructions: Mix all ingredients and add ice. Shake well pouring ingredients into a second glass. At this point coat the rim of the first glass with salt. Repour your drink into the salted glass. Add fresh squeezed lime, kick back and enjoy!

Shake the orange juice and the grape tonic with lots of ice in a shaker. Pour it in a glass and add the 7-Up and the Vodka. Last, add some lemon and decorate with one slice of orange and one slice of lemon.
Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.
Throw all the ingredients in a blender. Then blend till mixed. Ice-cream suggested for more milk shake like drink.
Fill jigger with ice. add all ingredients. Cover, shake and pour into shot glasses.
Let Crushed Ginger sit in the 1 1/2 oz of rum for as long as possible -- overnight if you can. Add honey to glass. Top with hot water.
Poyr Bailey's and Grand Marnier into mug. Add espress. Serve it hot with lots of cream and sprinkle with chocolate.
Shake in jigger with ice and pour into martini glasses
Combine all ingredients and mix well. Add ice and drink up.

Add equal Parts Vodka, Rum, and Melon in a tall cocktail glass with ice. Add a couple of splashes of triple sec (orange Liquor). Fill to the top with sweet and sour. Add a splash of 7 up and grenadine.

Mix kool-aid according to instructions. Fill glass with ice. Pour in citrus vodka. Add kool-aid until glass is full.
Put all ingredients into the shaker. Shake hard and serve in cocktail glass.

Pour Cointreau into glass. Using a spoon, drop the Cherry Advocaat in so it sits on the bottom of the glass. Making sure you have a straw handy, throw the shot back, place the glass on the nearest table and quickly cover the opening of the glass with your hand. Stick the straw between the fingers covering the glass and suck!

pour it all into an ice-cream pail and add more vodka if you wish.

mix in the glass

Pour Campari in the glass. Add Indian Tonic Water. Stir with a spoon. Add ice if you want & a slice of Orange.
Mix together in shot glass and "discharge" into mouth!

The first thing to do is add the ice. 4 large cubes work well. Then add the vodka. A good way to measure is to fill it almost to the top of the ice cubes. Add the OJ until it is almost to the top of the glass and then add a little mountain dew. The more dew you add, the less vodka taste you have. (The oj also does a nice job of killing the vodka taste) . Then enjoy.
stir or shake ingredients & serve with ice
Pour into shot glass starting with tequila, followed by J.D. and finally Southern. Shoot it.
Mix on ice and serve.

Pour vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana, then top it up with Sprite & stir.
Mix all the ingredients together and pour into shot glasses.
Put Pop Rocks Candy in bottom of shot glass. Add Cinnamon Schnapps. Stir, and shoot immediately.
Pour the Captain Morgan over plenty of ice in a highball glass. Top with the seven-up, stir and enjoy!
Absolute can be varied to taste and alcohol tollerance. Discretion is advised. Also a dash of lime can be added for a slightly different taste.

This can be on the rocks or up... but best on the rocks! Start with the Midori since it is heaviest, then the Chambord and the Absolut. Fill the glass 2/3 full with Cranberry juice, and then a splash of grapefruit for color. It should be an orangish-red color. Garnish with several cherries.

Pour Crown Royal into beer mug (or whatever type of glass that is available). Fill with chilled Dr. Pepper or add ice cubes before pouring. Stir gently with fork, spoon, knife, toothbrush or whatever is handy or forget to stir and wait for surprise at bottom.

Ole Skeiedal, from Norway, took first place in the long drinks listing of the 1993 Finlandia Vodka International Drinks Competition.

Made in large quantities usually. Mixing varies depending on personal preference. Mix Jell-O as you normally would. Replace 26oz of water with 26oz of vodka (strong). Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

Fill a pint glass a quarter of the way with ice, then add the rums and juice. Fill the rest of the glass with the Sweet and Sour, almost to the top, then finish it off with the grenadine. Mix and serve.
Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.
Just pour it all into the blender and mix until desired consistency is achieved.
Place Sprite/7up into glass. Pour Heineken to top off. Mixture can be varied. Good summertime drink.
Pour the coffee in an ordinary coffee cup. Add the aquavit. Add sugar by taste. Stir and have a nice evening (morning)
mix in tumbler with ice strain in shot glass.
pour the ingredients into a norma drink glass with a few ice-cubes. stirr.
pour sambuca into shot glass float Bailies on top enjoy
Add Grenadine (based on desired sweetness), followed by Absolut. Add ice and then Sprite (her preferred mixing).
Add in the order given and enjoy!
Mix add shake all the ingredience except the soda water in a shaker with ice. Pour it into a collins glas, add up with sodawater. Add ice and a lemon slide.
Shake not too short with enough ice.
just mix together
Mix ingredients with ice and shake. Serve with ice strained out.
Pour over ice, shake vigorously, Strain into martini style cocktail glass. Garnish with one filbert.

Take a tall glass, put a few ice cubes on top of each other. Pour the Gin and the rum in the glass, Fill the glass with bitter lemon. Leave some of the ice over the surface, so that you can pour the angostura on top of it. It should leave a rather nice track of red down the ice cubes.
Layer each part in glass first: Triple Sec second: Kahlua third: Cream
Put the ingredients in a shaker and shake them with ice. Pour the drink in a highball (without the ice!) and enjoy the fresh, creamy mix.
Stir over ice and pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon zest.
Fill glass with ice (crushed or cubes). Add ingredients and stir ocassionally.
Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. old-fashioned glass and serve.
Build into a Pint Glass and cheery garnish. It's a real lady killer in San Diego.
To Pitcher full of Ice, add Peach Schnapps, Rum, Vodka, Gin, and juices. Stir well. Serve.
Mix it together.
Mix melon liqueur, sour, and soda with ice in shaker. Shake and strain into martini glass. Top with rum and ignite.
Add 1 shot rum to 12 oz beer, stir in 2 tbls lime juice concentrate.
Build over ice in an 11 oz. glass Looks and tastes like a big stick popsicle
Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with Bartons Vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.
Mix it all togheter and stir it up.
Add Schnapps, Dribble Bailey's to give the look of a brain and add a few drops of grenadine to make that hemmorage look.
Pour the vodka and rum carefully but not too carefully into a glass. They have different consistencies and you want them to mix just a little. Now let several drops of Bailey's fall into the liquor.
Serve on ice.
Serve on ice.

Mix fruit juices together in one bowl, place in blender with ice cubes. When slushy mixture is complete, stir in alcohol and shake until completly mixed. Place mixture in punchbowl, and float cherries in the bowl if desired.
Build the sugar syrup, lemon juice, Mandarine Napoleon and Finlandia Vodka. Serve in a cocktail or champagne glass with a splash of ginger ale.

high ball glas fill it with ice. poor vodka over the ice, then fill up with sprite. poor slowly 1cl blue curacao, after that poor 1cl grenadine. Ready to serv. The guest will now stir it and the drink will turn purple.
Put Pernod in a pint glass. Fill almost to the top with cider and add the blackcurrant. After that, it's up to you.

Fill glass 1/4 with coffee, pour Tia Maria, Frangelico, & Amaretto slowly, add whipped cream on top, cherry if you want to. When drinking, stir gently if you like your coffee light. Drink from the bottom with a straw if you like it strong. Still looking for a better name, e-mail me if you think of one, or if you've heard of it with another name. imrey@aol.com
Shake vigorously over ice and strain into a rocks glass.
Pour all ingredients over ice in a large (16 oz.)glass. Shake vigorously. Garnish with grated chocolate. YUMMM!
Stir ingredients on ice and strain into martini glass.
Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy
Mix together in a a large glass and fill remainder with Orange Juice. Serve Cold
Just mix it! Also add some lime.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Prepare a cafe-latte as normal. Add liquors acording to taste. Serve hot or over ice as a chilled coffee beverage.
Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, strain into glass, garnish with lime.
Serve in plastic Champagne Glasses without the plastic bottoms
Combine orange juice, wine, sugar, brandy and Cointreau. Add lemon and orange slices. Chill. To serve, add ice and club soda, stir gently.
Mix the two ingredients and shake it well.You may serve it pure or with ice on a small cafe glass
blend liqeuors with ice-cream, milk and syrup. pour into parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.
Blend all the ingredients in blender, garnished with cinnamon powder.

Mix together the Southern Comfort and the Cranberry Juice and stir. then add the Lime Juice (be careful not to get too much lime). Serve cold! You can substitute lemon juice for the lime juice if needed.
Pour Southern Comfort and O.J together and serve chilled

Use a shot-glass and fill to the above proportions. Light the drink on fire. (It helps if you move the lighter in a circular pattern around the top of the drink.) Shoot it through a straw. Be careful!
Combine with ice. Shake. Strain and add ice.
Combine in a blender at low speed for 15 seconds. Strain, add ice.
Build over ice drink with a straw.
Serve in a tall glass
Take a shot glass and take equal amounts of the liquor. First the Kahlua, then slowly pour down the Drambuie, then the Bailey's and last the Cointreau. Try to get fine layers.
add the liquors and grenadine. Mix. Strain. Add splash of Sprite. Add lemon squeeze. Drinker adds shot of beer.
Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.
Made as in a normal Vodka and Orange, with raspberry cordial added last.
Disolve bullion cube in water. Mix in vodka and Tabasco. Garnish with celery.
pour strega into chilled wine glass, add champagne. Stir slightly.
Just pour off the amount into a shot glass Shoot and Enjoy!
Mix the icing sugar with the red wine, and stir well. Pour in the soda. Put in some Orange/Lemon slices. Serve immediately with a lot of ice.
Mix above ingredients in a shaker. Shake and serve on the rocks.
Fill a glass with ice. Pour the 151. Pour the Dr. Pepper. Pour the Amaretto. Stir.
Pour ingredients on the rocks and enjoy.
Fill glass with ice: add Galliano, Creme De Menthe and Vodka. Top glass off with orange juice. Enjoy!
Pour 2 oz. of Malibu Rum into a 10 oz. glass. Then fill the rest of the glass with orange juice, strawberry juice, and a splash banana syrup.
Fill blender with coffee ice-cream and the amount of kahula to your desire. Blend until drinkable, pour into a beer mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.
First you drink the vodka (no swallowing), then you drink the Baileys. You mix it in the mouth and swallow.
Mix in shotglass(es). Add Curacao last, to a nice blue-green color.
Pour Kool-aid into jug, add vodka and rum. add 1 pouch of Kool-aid (cherry or orange) cover and shake give to best looking girl in the room and party
Combine and Stir
Mix Tuaca and Cider in a large microwavable mug. Heat on high for 2 1/2 minutes. stirr again, and enjoy!!!
Fill tall glass with ice. Pour in Melon Liqueur and Vodka. Fill glass with juice. Orange juice may also be used.
Mix the strawberrys in a blender Pour it together with the vodka,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker. Shake well and pour in a highballglass. Fill up with the Russchian water
Add Amaretto, OJ, and Sour in a tub over ice.

Moisten rim of cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake ingredients together, and pour into glass filled with crushed ice. Option: Mix above ingredients with one cup of ice in blender for a smooth, "granita" type drink.
pour both ingredients in shot glass and enjoy!
Pour all three ingredients into an short shaker with ice. For better taste, let it chill for a bit.
Pour in glass, drink!
mix just like you would a screwdriver, except substitute lime vodka
Pour ingredients over ice and stur.
No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.
Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.
Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.
Combine Jägermeister and Rumple Minze over ice in glass. Fill to top with Cola.
Pour Creme de Menthe and Kahlua in a glass over ice. Add milk to fill. Garnish with whatever you'd like. Enjoy!

Splash a puddle of Angostura bitters into a saucer and place the sugar cube in it to soak. This will take a minute ot two. Stir the Champagne (or sparkling wine), the Vodka and the Blue Curacao together in a container and put into the fridge to chill. Place the soaked sugar cube in the bottom of the Champagne glass, pour in the mixture and add drop in the cocktail onion, which should be loose, not on a cocktail stick.
Mix together then strain thru ice.
Combine all ingredients, shake well and serve over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry (and an umbrella if handy).
Mix all ingredients together over ice. Stir well. Enjoy
Pour in the Rum first followed by the 12 oz of Nestea. Make sure you have stirred well. Serve Chilled!!
Crush ice in a blender. Add frozen strawberries and banana to blender. Put on low speed and add Malibu & Banana liqueur. Pour into tall glass.
Fill a 12 ounce glass with ice, add 1 ounce of vodka, 1 ounce of triple sec and 1 ounce of midori, fill with yellow lemonade and enjoy.
Mix Zinfandel with Chambord and add 7-Up. Serve on ice.
In blender add Orange Tang Mix, Absolut Vodka, and ice. Blend until smooth.

Put Bailey's into a shot glass about 2/3 full. Fill the rest of the shot with Lemon or Lime juice. Take the shot and Swish it around in your mouth. It feels really neat. Swallow it before it becomes solid.
Nothing special. Vodka, then oj, then twister. Add a splash of raspberry sparkling water if desired.
Pour alcohol into the shot glass. Occassionally mix with ice then put into a shot glass. Serve with a lemon wedge.
Just blend and drink. It's deadly.
Combine in shot glass and stir.
Add all ingrediants in mixing tin with ice and strain
use large metal container with plenty of ice and a strainer. Shake well, pour through strainer into margarita glass. Serve with salt and fresh lime.
Just pour it all into a blender. Vary the amount of Vodka according to how buzzed you want to be. Remember, it must have at least 2 oz. of Vodka in order to be called White Lightening.
After mixing each ingredient in order shown, light the 151 with a match. Blow out the flames, and sip drink quickly with a straw.

Scoop ice-cream into a large bowl (stainless or glass, but plastic will do). Slowly pour wine into bowl and mix until smooth (but not runny, or melted). Fold in (well drained) fruit cocktail. Serve in wine glass with ice-cream scoop (add tacky paper umbrella if desired). Keep in freezer when not being served.
Pour together serve over ice

Pour alcohol over ice in a cocktail glass and add milk! (For a bit of a twist you could add a splash of Bailey's Irish Cream. This drink is also tasty as a 'special' coffee. Just sugar your rim, add liqour, pour coffee and add some whip.)
fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.
Mix all three ingredients in mixing tin with ice. Serve in a shot glass.

Put all ingredients except the 3 lime wedges into a shaker. Squeeze 2 of the lime wedges into the shaker. SHAKE WELL! Rim outside of glass only, with lime. Salt only the outside of glass. Add fresh crushed ice to glass. Strain mixture over ice. Squeeze remaining lime wedge in glass. Enjoy!
Rim coffee mug with celery salt, Pour Baileys over ice and fill with bloody mary mix. Garnish with pickle spear and filberts.
Mix all ingredients in a tall glass on the rocks.
Pour both ingredients into shot glass and enjoy!
Pour both into a pint glass, mix and drink.
Put each of the ingredients into a punch bowl. Mix, and with a straw, SHOOT.
Pour Southern Comfort to the first line of a 16 oz. Solo Brand plastic cup. Add splash of Bacardi 151 Rum. Add 7-Up, Orange Juice, and Coca-Cola. Swirl it around in the cup a little bit and enjoy.
Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!
Combine alcohol over ice and add Mountain Dew. Stir and Garnish with Melon ball if desired.
Fill collins glass with ice. Pour alcohols. Pour juices. Shake Optional. Orange and Pineapple garnish Optional

Take the vodka in first, then orange juice and sprite. Then you take some dashes of grenadine and stirr it around for 20 sec. On the top of it you have a little dash of Strawb.marg.mix. Add ice cubes.
Fill a large glass with ice. Add vodka and fill glass with Pepsi (Do NOT substitute Coke). Swirl a splash of Galliano on top.
Shake all the above ingredients in a tin with ice.
Shake with ice, strain into glass
Place 2-3 ice cubes in your choice of glass, pour 2oz vodka followed by 6oz Sunny Delight (more or less to taste). Stir and serve.
Flash blend with ice cubes.
Pour one oz. of Peppermint Schnapps into a cup of coffee. Then ad two tps. of sugar and slowly stir.
Pour into a five gallon pitcher, the canister of lemonade, water, everclear and mix. serve on ice.
Fill glass with ice. Add whiskey, Malibu and Dr. Pepper Stir.
Shake all the ingredients. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of orange.
Throw it all into a glass, shoot as fast as possible. Do this repeatadly until very inebriated!
Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the larger and cider one after another.

In a hurricane glass or any tall glass: Fill glass 1/3 full of Fz. strawberry daiquiri. Layer next 1/3 of glass with Fz. Pina Colada. Add a splash of Blue Curacao on top. Insert straw and fill with 151 Rum.
Pour vodka, then orange juice, then peach schnapps. Drink.

Start by adding the vodka and the banan liqueur. Fill the glass with sprite or similar soft drink. Pour some conc. orange juice. Stir. Add some grenadine for that nice Tequila Sunrise effect, or don't if you think it will be to sweet. Add a slice of orange for decoration.
Pour ingredients together and stir
Combine all ingredients except 151, shake well with ice, pour into highball glass and top it off with Bacardi 151.
Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.
Stire Rum and Banana liqueur with ice. Add Sprite
Combine, chill and strain into either a shot glass or ups glass.
Pour as listed.
Mix both ingredients in a shot glass. Tilt head back. Swallow.

First slice half a lemon in small slices. Then some ice, I prefer alot of ice in this drink. Pour the vodka in, press the rest of the lemon in the glass. Mix around and then fill up with Schweppes lemon. Mix again and you're finished. If you don't got the Schweppes lemon you can always use Fanta lemon instead, but it will be a lot sweeter.
Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.
Follow the instructions on the can of Lemonade concentrate, but substitute the Vodka for water. Mix well and add beer.
Mix vodka and midori and kiwi with ice. Add sourmix. Shake. Fill with soda. Decorate glass with pineapple.
Mix all three together.
Put ice cubes in the Collins glass. Then poor the white rum. Fill with the fruit punch and the ginger ale.

Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.
Throw the shit in the shot glass and drink it down!
Take ink pen and stir well!
Mix the contents so that the color of the drink is a pink color. Serve and enjoy
Fill a shaker with ice. Pour in equal parts liquor. Shake or swirl. Strain into shot glass(es). Serve with a short, cold glass of beer.
keep both liquors cold and serve ina chilled shot glass if possible
Add Vodka, Melon Liqueur and Cranberry Juice in a shaker, Fill glass with three ice cubes,strain mix into highball/zombie glass,add dash of Amaretto (Optional)
Get a sports container like the All Sport or Gatorade ones at sports events and combine three ingredients together. Put in about 4-5 pounds of cocktail ice and watch it disappear faster than water!
Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.
Layer Barenjaeger on top of the Jägermeister. Both liquors should be chilled.

Shake and strain into a double shot glass.
Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.
Mix all ingrediants over ice. Seven-Up may be used instead of champagne to cut alcohol content if so desired.

First add the Bailey's irish cream, then the Tia Maria, and then carefully the Absinthe: Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.

Blend vodka and cointreau in a shotglass. Set the drink on fire with a match. Put the piece of sugar on a fork and hold it over the flame from the drink and let it melt down into the glass. When the sugar has melted,use the palm of your hand to put out the flame.
Just throw it together.
Combine in an ice cube-filled Collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into chilled old-fashioned glass.
Combine the two jacks in glass.
Fill glass with ice, add SKYY vodka, add orange juice, prefeable fresh orange juice. Garnish with orange slice.
Stir ingredients and let sit for one minute.
Pour all four shots into a low ball glass, chill if you care.
Mix the orange juice with sugar and the yolk of an egg. Then pour in the vodka with some icecubes and stir. Serve well chilled.
Pour Bailey's and Amaretto into a shot glass, swish, and throw it back.
Shake over ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

Fill 1/3th of the glass with Tia Maria. Then pour smootly on a spoon the baileys so it flows on the Tai Maria. Then fill the glass up with Grand Marnier also with a spoon. Afterwards you see 3 layers, the middle layer looks like a after boming scene.
Mix equal parts over ice, shake, strain, and serve...SPF 30!
Mix equal parts over ice then shake, strain, and serve.
Combine ingredients in shot glass. Shoot!
Mix all three in a shot glass and shoot the damn thing.

Using a large glass of water, add lemonade concentrate to taste (Best if you make it a little stronger than usual). Add the 1.5 shots of Everclear and be sure to mix well!
Dip rim of shot glass in chocolate syrup. Add Kahlua and Jägermeister. Place arms behind back. Drink shot using mouth only (a la "blowjob").
Mix on the rocks.

Mix all ingredients in glass. Garnish with small pickle. Light contents of glass on fire. Tilt head back and have your buddy pour it into your mouth (very carefully). Have four more hot lunches and go to bed. You have no business going anywhere after the abuse you just gave yourself.
all ingredients but 7-up in shaker. splash 7-up in your glass, shake others till nice and cold and add to glass. Voila!
Mix all ingredients into a large cooler, punch bowl or garbage can (a new one). Cut larger fruit into pieces and add.
Pour all into shaker with ice. Shake until cold. Strain into highball glass.

First pour in the pear soda. Then take the Fanta and the juice. Please use a cognac bowl when mixing and drinking the drink. Then attach the cucumber slice to the rim, as you would do with a lemon slice. Blend and serve instantly!!!!
Just shoot the damn thing!
Put ice in cup and fill it half full with sprite. Add maui filling the glass. Stir.
Mix the ingredients with a mixer.
Mix everything except the liquor with ice, strain it to remove the shell and skin, blend with liquor.
Crush sugar into the lime wedges with a spoon. Place the lime wedges in the bottom of an 8 oz. glass. Cover with crushed ice. Pour vodka to fill the glass. It's a great summer drink.
All the ingredients in a mixing glass. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

Boil 1 cup water and add to peach passion fruit jello until dissolved about 2 minutes. Add 1 cup Malibu rum and pour into shot glasses or 1 ounce cup found in party stores. Chill for four hours. Enjoy!!!
Blend all but the whipped cream until frosty. Pour in beer mug. Top with whipped cream. Enjoy.

Mix all at same time into blender. After blending for approx. 30 seconds, fill beer mug 3/4 way and start a chugin'. Oh, it'll burn like hell for about 2 minutes, but once that sauce burns through your stomach lining and virtually injects the alcohol into your blood stream, put the unfinished El Bastardo down because you're gonna hit the floor.
stir & strain in a cocktail glass
Add wink to gin, stir, add ice if desired.
Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice
Fill glass 3/4 with ice. Add the Root Beer Schnapps. Add the cream. Slowly fill with coke.
blend vodka, blue curacao and bailey's in a shaker. pour into glass and top up with coke.
Mix all ingredients together in a gallon pitcher and refrigerate. Serve chilled.
Pour over ice into an collins glass. Garnish with lemon and orange twists. You may fill with some club soda.
Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle with nutmeg.
Place ice in a tin then pour 1/2 oz. of Midori melon liqueur and 1/2 oz. of Rumple Minze. Shake and then strain into a rocks glass.
Add ice. Shake it. Strain it. Shoot it.
Fill a mug half way with Bacardi, then top off with lemon Kool-Aid or lemonade.
In a blender put ice cubes, chocolate syrup, cherry brandy, vodka, and milk. Blend very well.
Mix 1part apple schnapps with 1 part Yukon Jack and serve in shot glass.
Mix all ingredients and blend well. Add more Coca-cola if needed. Serve with a slice of lemon put a straw in and drink.
Pour alcohol into glass then add Coke. Stir if necessary.
Mix with ice and serve!
Stir well with ice and a spoon.
Add the coffee liqueur first since it is heavier than the schnapps. Slowly add the peppermint schnapps.
Fill cocktail chimney glass with crushed ice, fill 3/4 full with club soda, add a shot of blueberry schnapps and a splash of o.j. Can garnish with an orange peel or a blueberry.
Mix vodka and tequila. Pour in Tabasco sauce until it's realy red.
Pour 1 1/4 ounce of Smirnoff Vodka in glass, fill with ginger beer, add ice and squeeze lime.
Put the crushed ice in glass first then add the Captain Morgan then add the Amaretto then top off with Coke.
Make sure the Hot Damn and the Jägermeister are both cold before serving.
Pour the liquor. Fill with juice to taste.
stir all ingredients together - pour over ice - enjoy!!
Add ice, put in Sprite, then add Pineapple Juice, followed by the Coconut Rum and Peach Schnaps. Serve very cold.
Shake with cracked ice. Serve in a 12 oz. glass. Garnish with a cherry and 1/2 slice orange in a tooth pick.
Pour into a large crushed iced filled cup and pour back into the collins glass. Use a plastic stirring utensil if so desired
Combine in a pint glass, shake and serve with a lemon wedge
Combine and stir
Chill cocktail glass. Add grenadine and amaretto to the chilled glass. Finally, add chilled vodka.
Pour coffee over crushed ice,or small ice cubes,in blender. Add all other ingredients and blend on high speed until desired consistency.
Combine in a shaker over a few ice cubes. Shake thoroughly. Pour into a collins glass and serve.
Combine all contents in blender except cherries, blend until smooth. Pour in mug, garnish with cherries.
Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.
Pour all contents in glass over cubed ice and mix together.

Mix the Amaretto & Bacardi in one shot glass. Fill the beer mug 1/2 way with beer. Light the Bacardi & Amaretto with a match or lighter. Drop the flaming shot glass into the beer. It immediately begins to foam up. At this point gulp it down (be careful not to swallow the shot glass!).
Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a frosted zombie glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.
Mix everything and shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Serve.
Pour the vodka and the liqueur in a (long drink) glass with one or two icecubes in it. Fill it up with Schweppes Russchian.
Fill glass with ice. Add Kool-Aid powder, Southern Comfort and Coke. Stir well (never shake)
serve as a chilled shot
Pour vodka in large soft drink tumbler first. Tastes more like carbonated Ribena than grape soda. Very powerful!

Pour 1/3 ounce tabasco sauce into a one ounce shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with either HOT 100 or if you prefer you can use a regular cinnamon schnapps. Drink immediately after making. This drink will lose flavor quickly.
Since this is basically a shot drink, mix to your own taste

drinks.strDrink: Long Island Iced Tea (By a Long Islander)
drinks.strInstructions: Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into shaker and give ONE brisk shake. Pour back into glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon.
Just Mix it and drink it slow!
Add ingredients shake and pour over ice
shake all ingredients and serve as a shooter
Pour creme de banana into the glass and layer blue curacao on top.
Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).
Shake the ingridiens together and poor over in a cocktail-glass.
Shake like crazy with about 6 ice cubes. Pour into a chilled margarita glass, rimmed with lime juice and salt. Garnish with a wedge of lime.
Pour 2 oz. Southern Comfort over ice in an 8 oz. glass. Fill with cranberry juice. Squeeze one wedge of lime into drink. Stir and serve.
Above amounts are for an 8 oz glass. Build over ice: Kahlua, then Vodka, milk, then Coke.
Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!
Mix all ingredients, shake and pore over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon, lime, and orange wedge.
Mix ingredients in shaker and pour over ice. Serve cold. Great on a hot day!
Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.
Shake all with ice, serve in lowball over ice, or neat in a martini glass.

Half fill a 20oz glass (preferrably in the shape of a Cowboy Boot) with ice, regular or crushed. Pour the spirits over the ice. Add lemon-lime mix leaving room at the top for the 1/2 oz of Coca-Cola to dirty the drink.
Ice, then rum, then orange juice. Mix
Add Vidka and peach juice. Fill glass with ice and add vanilla to taste. If the drink is too sweet, dilute it with water.

Pour all ingredients into a cooler, chill, and serve. As with most punches, it's hard to be specific about the amounts used. A general rule: pour as much of everything as tastes good, then add more vodka! To make life more interesting, throw in pieces of fruit, and add dry ice to the cooler before serving. Small plastic animals also make a nice garnish (but don't drink them)!
Build drink in glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry.
Mix both ingredients together in a tumbler with ice. Strain into a shot glass! Enjoy!
Mix all together.

Put a few ice-cubes in a longdrink glass, and put a little lemon juice in it. Then cut a cucumber in two half and cut off a part. Get the seeds out and put it in the glass as well. Shake in a well cooled down bottle of champagne in and let the glass stand in the refrigerator for a while. Then it's ready to drink.
Fill Mason jar with crushed ice. Add pineapple juice and Malibu rum. Mix well. Add splash of greanadine and 151 proof rum. Garnish with cherry, pineapple, or other fruit slice.

Mix in the order: cacao, menthe, whiskey, milk. Try to keep the layers separate. Float on the back of a spoon, tilt the glass and pour very gently, etc. I suggest tilting the glass. When you tilt the glass you can, when pouring the cream/milk, rotate the glass causing the cream to swirl down through the other layers which looks good. Serve in an apertif glass.
Pour 1/4 inch to one inch Tabasco into shot glass. Pour Rum over Tabasco and shoot it.
Shake the three ingredients together and poor in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry on the rim of the glass.
Just pour all the contents together, and mix.
Add all , except the cola, into a flash cup, Flash for 10 sec. or till foamy. Served in beer mug over half mug of ice. Splash of cola top. If you have a chilled mug it's a plus.
Shake alcohol with ice. Strain and pour over ice in a tall glass. Add cranberry juice to fill most of the way. Add a splash of 7-up if you want it fizzy!
Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.
Place in a cold shaker with ice. Shake for one minute and serve over ice.

Skaking Serves with ice an a Lemon

First, you must pour the Sambuca in your shot glass and then slowly pour the orange juice. You may now enjoy Rick's fruity taste!
Mix the Schnapps, Rum and Tabasco in a Shooter Glass. Stir briefly.
Combine all ingredients in glass mixer, chill and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
