Blend all ingredients thoroughly and consume. Put a pair of pink panties on and go out and mow the grass.

The Tequila and Whiskey are mixed in the bottom of the shot glass. The Baileys is to act like the 'wax' in a shotgun shell and is layered on top of the whiskey/tequila mix. The fresh ground pepper is your 'buckshot' that creates the spice/burning sensation.
Pour amaretto into glass filled with ice, then add equal parts orange juice and lemon-lime soda to fill glass.
Add alcohol to snifter, then add ice with the 7-up.

Place one part dry gin in Cocktail Glass. Do NOT bruise the Gin! Carefully add two parts Sprite. Do NOT bruise the Sprite. Optionally, add a dash of cayenne pepper for added flavor. Add 3 tablespoons of dry ice for that mystical, yet strangely, psycho effect.
Put all ingredients in glass and stir. Served as a float drink. Can also be mixed in a blender and served as a shake.
Combine all together: if to strong, add more soda, more kick, add more Everclear.
Add all ingredients except Meyers dark rum and stir in a hurricane glass filled with ice. Add Meyers dark rum at the top, mix and enjoy!
Pour the Butterscotch, float the Bailey's and let the Kahlua sink to the bottom of the shot glass.
Bring water to a boil. Mix with a large package of Black Cherry Jello. Then add Peachtree Schnapps, mix well. Pour into small plastic shot or 2 oz. containers. Chill and enjoy.
Pour Mad Dog and Mountain Dew into a glass (plastic beer glasses work the best). Stir. Add a couple ice cubes.
Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.
Pour over ice, shake until cooled, then pour into glass.
Mix Tequila, Melon Liquor and Sweet and Sour Mix in Blender. Add ice. Serve in glass.
Mix all three in shaker with ice. Pour cold

Combine Rum, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice in a regular sized blender. Blend on low speed to mix liquid ingredients. Fill blender to top with ice. Blend on high speed until ice is grainy. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge.

First and foremost, BUY A NEW GARBAGE CAN, and wash it out thoroughly!!!!! (Preferably the big ones 40-55gal). First Pour in all of the Grain (10 bottles of 1.75ml [Handle]), keep in mind that this recipie is for a Large Party, not 10 people sitting around getting loaded.....Anyway, next add the dry packets of mix. We used to get the largest industrial bags we could, don't go for quality, you're not going to remember anyway. Now this is the most critical part, the fruit. This is why I put this on here...any joker can make punch, but I figured I would distibute my years of fruit research for free....the Best friends you have in the Fruit community are the Orange and the Apple. This is because they absorb the grain better than anything else I tested. So make sure you get some of these in every glass you get, and eat them, DON'T EVER THROW THESE OUT, this is the best part of the drink. Bananas suck, they get gushy, watermellon works ok but the seeds get to be a pain in the ass when you can't see so well, pineapple is good, basically you get the point. Cut the fruit into wedges and throw it in the mix and let it sit around for a minute...Now throw in the bags of ice and fill it up to desired potency with water, mixing can be done with a canoe paddle or a 2x4 or anything else you've got lying around...a disposable camera is usually a good partner while drinking this concoction, people get really outta hand and go off the deep end.....This goes well as an iceblock shot too.
When we make it, we empty half a can of Cherry Coke, pour the vodka into the can, then pour in the Kool-aid. I'm sure it would work in a 12oz glass. Stir - a kabob stick works well in the can.
Stir until color is even.
Served Chilled. Pour equally.
Add ice to glass. Add Alcohol. Add Sweet and Sour mix. Fill to the top with Cola (preferably Pepsi). Squeeze and add lemon
Fill glass with ice. Add 2 oz vodka and fill the glass with lemonade.
Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

Keep all 3 liquors in freezer till they are viscous. (Jägermeister should have a syrup quality.) Mix all three in shaker and pour in a extra tall frosted shot glass. (Should be one of those unusually tall shot glasses if possible, otherwise use small whiskey glass as this is a unusually large shot.) Serve Cold!
Pour all the stuff in a punch bowl and drink. (Tastes better with Diet Dew)
Mix the liquers, and put the other things it it :)
Built Drink usually want a slight bit more sour than cranberry experiment to personal taste ganish with lemon wheel
This a kind of a Pousse Cafe. Float Irish cream over the Kahlua. Shake Cream with Cointreau. Float on the Irish cream. Garnish with choclate.
Layer in Shot Glass, Banded Red/White/Blue shot is perfect for the fourth of July
For best results mix all ingredients into a frosted Mug.
Shake with ice. Strain into a small or regular size rocks glass.

Just get a high-ball glass and add your 1 or 2 shot(s) of Bailey's, then your 1 or 2 shots of Tia Maria, then just simply slowly top the glass with the coca-cola. It will fizz alot so watch out! Due to the fizz a straw is a definate recommindation.

First off, mix the orange juice with the malibu in a seperate glass, pour the firewater in the martini glass, the orange mix over it and when it's settled, pour the vodka slowly over the mixture. It doesn't have to be anything special: I tend to use a Lambrusco because of the pearliness, also the amount of wine you use will affect the taste of the drink immensely. I use between 1/2 cl to 1 cl, not more, other wise the tatse of the wine will dominate too much. To get your optimal taste you'll just have to experiment a little back and forth.

Place a short rock (wide mouthed spirit glass) on bar. Pour the blue curacao, white sambuca and chatreuse into a brandy balloon (snifter). Place the brandy balloon horizontally, balancing on the mouth of the short rock. -- Ignite the alcohol in the brandy balloon. Rotate the brandy balloon (like a cement mixer). Pour mixture from brandy balloon to short rock while it is alight. The stream of alcohol falling between the glasses should form a waterfall of fire cascading into the short rock. (I am a poet also) Use the upside down brandy balloon to suffocate the drink in the short rock. Be sure the flames are out. -- Remove the brandy balloon and inhale the fumes. Shoot the drink. -- Hold on to the bar very tightly!

drinks.strDrink: Sit On My Face Mary Jane
drinks.strInstructions: Pour all three ingredients into the shot glass and shake until mixed together

Mix the Snapple and whiskey in a pewter martini shaker. (preferably pewter because it keeps the drink so cold). Next step put crushed ice in very last so you do not water down the drink. Serve in a martini glass or a huricane glass with 4 lemon drops.
dump the shots in glass then fill with oj to taste

Dip the rim of cocktail glass in Amaretto and then into powdered sugar. Shake all alcohol and cream with ice and strain into rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with Cinnamon stick and whipped cream (optional)
Slap it in, stir it around and take it down.
Pour out 1/4 gallon gatorade, pour in 1/4 gallon vodka. Cap and shake.
Bailey's first. Pour Kahlua. Float Everlear. Bottoms up!
Pour beer into mug. Add lemonade. Float SoCo on top.
Pour rum into shot glass. Add tabasco to the top. Serve room temperature.
Fill shaker with ice, add ingreidients to taste. Don't want rum to overpower. Shake well, pour into shot glasses.
Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.
Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.
Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.
Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.
stir with a straw
Shake well, serve cold
Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.
Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.
mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently
Pour ingredients into glass in order given, carefully so each layer floats on top of the previous one with mixing. Chill for 1/2 hour before serving.
Pour over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Served over ice - very chilled!
Pour ingredients over ice and stir.
Pour 2 oz. Gin (seagrams lemon lime, best), over Ice cubes. Then pour 4 oz. of Lemon lime Gatorade. To finish pour 2 tbspn of lime juice and mix.
First add the chocolate syrup smoothly on the bottom of the glass. Then mix Vodka in followed by Coca-cola
Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass
Mix the Schnapps, Southern Comfort, and Tabasco. Pour into cocktail glass. A cherry may be added.
Combine all ingredients in Collins glass filled with ice.
Pick a highball glass and add som ice. Pour 2 cl of vodka. Add 1 cl of Rose's lime juice. Fill up with equal amounts of grape tonic and orange juice. Add a straw, stir and serve.
Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.
Layer in order.
Pour tequila and Kahlua into glass. Add ice. Fill with cranberry juice and stir with straw. A lemon wedge and umbrella are a nice touch.

Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake a jigger of Amaretto with the juice of 1/2 a lemon. Strain into glass and add ice. Garnish with a Marachino Cherry.
Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.
Mix and stir and pour over ice
Mix and stir and pour over ice
Mix all ingredients in blender with ice, to the consistency of a margarita.
Shake all ingredients on ice and strain.
First drink 1/4 of the Sprite and fill up the 1/2l bottle with Hammer Lime vodka and drink!
Pour orange juice in first, then the peach schnaps. Then pour the shot of midori down the side of the glass, so that the midori forms a layer at the bottom of the glass.
Mix it half and half and serve chilled. Enjoy!
Shake Vodka, Bailey's and Blue Curacao with ice. Pour into glass and fill up with 7-UP.
Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.
Pour 2 1/2 ounces Cuervo Gold over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with tonic. Garnish with lime wedge.
Rub inside of glass with lemon juice, then sprinkle with sugar. Freeze glass to achieve a frosted affect. Shake together the other ingrediants. Pour into frosted glass and enjoy!
Pour all ingredients over ice. Garnish with slice of banana.
Pour vodka in glass followed by the Kahlua. Add the dash of coke (to taste) and stir. Top up the glass with guinness and serve.
Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. ENJOY!!
Ice Glass. Add Vodka and Frangelico just like any other drink. Fill with milk. Shake because it is a milk drink.
Ice Cocktail glass. Add Vodka and mixers. Fill with sour mix and shake because of sour mix.

Using a partner of the opposite sex, lick their kneck to moisten. Pour packet of sugar onto their kneck. Place wedge of lemon in their mouth with the skin pointed inward. You first lick the sugar from their kneck, then shoot the vodka, then suck the lemon from their mouth (while gently holding back of their kneck.
just pour and stur

Place the jalapeño on the bottom of a shot glass and fill the glass with tequila. Next cover the surface with Tabasco sauce or Red Hot and shoot it. Be sure to catch the jalapeno in your mouth while swallowing the rest. Chew the jalapeno separately, truly savoring the flavor, and swallow it. Olé!

In a 2 gallon jug pour in 9oz of marciano cherries and the juice. Then pour in fifth of vodka over cherries and let soak for a few minutes. Then pour in lemon juice and fill jug with sprite. Pour mixture into serving container and strain out cherries. When serving drinks over ice drop cherries in.
Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.
In a shaker mix Spiced Rum, Kahlua, and Cream. Pur into a Mason Jar filled with ice and add a splach of Coca-Cola. Garnish with a couple of Filberts.
Put alcohol in shaker with ice, shake. Put in hurricane glass over Grenadine to taste. Add in orange juice, pineapple juice and sprite to taste. Garnish with candied cherry.
Add 3/4 jigger of Schnapps then layer cranberry juice on top. May take a few "practice" shots to find the right amounts of each.
Mix all ingredients, place in shot glass. Introduce to mouth.
Take pitcher. Fill pitcher with bottle of Tom Collins mix. Add everclear to "taste" or 8 oz. if you are a stickler for recipes. Add ice. Get drunk.

Put an ice cube and a small amount of water in cocktail glass. Place in freezer for 2-3 minutes. Fill mixer with all ingredients including garnish. cover and shake hard 3 or 4 times. it is ok to bruise the gin on this one. Remove cocktail glass from freezer, empty, strain drink into cocktail glass add olive from mixer. Serve with a mysterious smile...

Add ice cubes to a mason jar glass. Pour 1 oz of each type of rum over ice. Pour 2 oz's of each juice over ice. Add 1 tsp of grenadine. Top with double shot of southern comfort. More juice could be used to mask liquor. Drink can be stirred if preffered.
Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently
Blend at high speed until smooth. Garnish with a lime wheel and cherry. Enjoy!

For the full effect you should use a large Folgers coffee can or a metal bucket. First, fill the can half full with ice and add the gin(the whole bottle). Next, add the concentrates and cherries. Finally, shake the can until its ready to drink.
pour surge then vodka, enjoy!
Combine in blender, blend until smooth, serves two in 12oz cups.
Mix in a shaker and serve with a slice of lime

Just add "EVERYTHING" except the Peach Schnapps into the MUG, Lightly stir and then add as much ice (smallest cubes possible) you can fit in. NOTE: Leave just enough room at the top for the 1/4 oz. of Peach Schnapps.
Pour tequila into shot glass. Fill the rest of glass with 7-up. Cover top of glass with hand and slam hard onto counter or bar. This causes shot to fizz, so drink quickly!
fill collins glass with ice pour in rum and blue curacao pour in sweet & sour mix splash cola lemon twist garnish

Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.
Shake or blend until frothy, then pour over ice and garnish with toasted coconut.
Layer each ingredient into a Sherry Glass in order as listed. Indulge in this creamy minty flavour!
Build over ice. Garnish with strawberry or cherry.
Build over ice. Garnish with strawberries or cherries.
Build over ice. Granish with strawberries or cherries.
Layer in order.
Layer in order.
Layer in order.
Layer in order.
Layer in order.
Pour in order.
Pour one shot of tequila into the glass. Add Tabasco to taste

Start with a shot or two (depending on your preference) of vodka in the glass. Add organge juice until its almost full. Then add a shot or two of Kahlua , just until its has a bit of color. Then some ice, and stirr
Shake and serve in highball glass filled with ice.
Shake all the ingrediants together and serve in a chilled glass.
Add over ice,shake and pour.
fill glass with ice and build drink top with splash of sour
build in a glass with ice and drink. you can also make it as a shot!!

In a 1 to 2 quart pan, bring 1 cup of cranberry juice and candied ginger to a boil over high heat. Boil, uncovered, about 2 minutes, set aside. With a vegetable peeler, pare peel (colored part only) from oranges: cut peel into thin 2 in long worms: or use an Oriental shredder to make long shreds. Add orange peel to cranberry mixture. Cover and chill at least 4 hours or as long as overnight. Juice oranges: put juice in a 6 to 8 quart pan or heavy bowl. Stir in cranberry-ginger mixture, the 3 cups cranberry juice, apple concentrate, limeade, grapes and water. If made ahead, cover and chill up to 2 hours. Add ginger ale and about a 1 pound piece of dry ice (DO NOT put small pieces in punch or cups): ice should smolder at least 30 minutes. Ladle into cups. Add any remaining ice when bubbling ceases.

Bring to a boil in a saucepan and reduce heat to simmer. Simmer gently for 15 minutes, stirring and muttering appropriate incantations. Serve in ghoulish glasses, garnish with an orange slice if desired.
Pour the Corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.
Pour Vodka, Gin and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.
Pour cream soda last: this gives a foam similar to that on an ice cream float.
Just fuckin' mix it
Blend OJ, Blue Maui, and Vodka, put in glass. Splash grenadine on top, but do not stir in . Drink
It's simple just add the 2 together and you've got "French Monkey Madness!!"
Pour Stoli, Kaluha into highball over ice. Top with Coke and serve.
Pour vodka and then blueberry schnapps into shot glass. Top off with the cranberry juice.
No mixing, just pour in in any order.

Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.
Pour the 1/4 shot kiwi liqueur in to the shot glass. Then add the 3/4 shot vodka. Drop in a green gummi fish candy, and serve.

Empty one can of Tropicana strawberry/orange/banana into a blender and 1/4 gallon vodka. Mix well. Pour half of this into a pitcher and set aside for later use, leaving the other half in the blender. Fill the blender with ice and blend until it resembles a slurpy. Drink up and start mixing the other half.
Just add all ingredients and add quite a lot of Angostura and try to make sure that the Angostura is mixed through the drink.
Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the "Guinness" its "head".
Pour all into any kind of glass, mix with small stick and add a slice of orange and a cherry in glass.
Pour 1 to 2 oz. of Canadian Club or other whiskey into a glass with ice. Add 1/2 can Dr. Pepper. Stir.
Add gin, cointrean and lemon juice to a shaker filled with ice shake hard (30 seconds) and serve up in a cocktail glass with lemon twist as garnish
For an extra kick, use Bacardi 151. If you want a lime taste, use Bacardi Limon.
Mix all ingredients in tin over ice. Strain into shot glasses and enjoy!!!!

Pour the gin, blue curacao and the tonic water into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge. If you want, you can add the blue curacao after stiring the drink.
Pour the vodka and then the russian. Stir gently. Drink.
Layer drink by pouring each shot slowly over the back side of a teaspoon held just above the liquid level.
Whisk with a fork, untill all mixed in. Add cream after mixing.
Pour 3/4 shot of Tequila in shot glass, top off with lime juice, splash in tabasco sauce, and shoot.
Mix over ice and strain
Mix Beer, Soda, and frozen lemonade into a large pitcher. Then fill empty lemon aid container with vodka and add to mixture. Stir.
Fill blender 1/2 full with ice cubes. Add 6 oz. can of frozen limeade. Add 6 oz. vodka (use limeade can to measure). Add 2 ripe peaches (remove pit and slice). Whip it!
Fill half a shaker with ice. Add the ingredients. Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Just mix the three ingredients one to one to one
2 shots of vodka, 2 shots of Peach Schnapps. Fill the rest with Ginger Ale, Lemonade, and OJ to taste
Layer each ingredient starting with Kahlua, then Bailey's and finish with the Banana liqueur. If you have difficulty layering the shooter (shot) use a tea spoon held upside down and poor over slowly.
Add vodka to glass over ice. Then add water and lemon lime mix. Stir until all is dissolved.
Combine both while cold.
Blend well with large scoop of ice.
Combine all ingredients into a large strainer/mixer. Add a handful of ice. Shake for a few seconds. Strain into a mason jar....

First place three or four ice cubes in a rock glass. The Bailey's is placed in the glass first otherwise the cream will curdle. Then the Bushmill's whiskey is added slowly and stirred until thoroughly mixed.
Combine 1/4 oz. peppermint schnapps with 2 oz. rootbeer schnapps. Fill with Dr.Pepper or rootbeer and stir. Garnish with a cherry over ice and serve.

First, fill the champagne flute with heaps of ice. Next, pour in your Schnapps and Midori. Now fill the flute to the top with Champagne. Let the drink settle for a minute (especially if you've been pouring behind a busy, bumpy nightclub!). Use a long bar straw to drink the shot from the bottom up (push the straw right to the bottom of the flute before starting), all at once! Very Important - Don't stop in the middle of the drink!
Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.
Pour peach Schnapps into shot glass. Add chilled cranberry juice to fill.
Shake VERY,VERY,VERY well in a shaker with lots of ice. leave the ice in the shaker, not in the drink. can be served with a red cherry in it.
Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.
Add the shots, 1/2 shots for the ladies. Over ice is best.Mix well.
First, add some ice. Then, pour in your Jack Daniels. Finally add Pepsi and slosh around to mix. Enjoy your victory drink.
Mix thoroughly.
Mix all above, pour over ice, and enjoy!!!
Fill dbl rocks glass with ice, add brandy, Kahlua,and milk. Shake well , return to glass.
Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.
Pour ingredients into a shot glass Enjoy!
fill glass with ice pour creme de cacao and the creme de menthe over ice. stir and enjoy. Is best after dinner but can be enjoyed anytime.
mix all ingrediants together in container. poor into shot glass.
Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.
Shake with ice and pour
Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.
combine in shaker. shake vigorously. strain into cocktail glass
Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.
Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into glass Decorate with slice of Orange, Pineapple and a red Cocktial cherry.
Pour ingredients into mixing cup 1/4 full ice. Stir then pour into shot glasses.
Add Ice-cream last. Enjoy!
Mix everything together in a hightumbler glass. Then drink it and get a "ragg"! (Swedish for Pickin up babes)
Pour vodka into a collins glass over three or four ice cubes and fill with apple juice. Pour creme de menthe, stir, and serve.
Begin by filling the glass halfway with Amaretto, add shots of melon, add shots of everclear, add rest of glass with pineapple juice, stir, then pour into glass with ice.
Mix the Vodka, 7-up & Soda in that order. Add lemon juice. Add salt gradually until the sweet taste of 7-up just disappears.
Add blue raspberry to ice, add vanilla, pinapple, and coconut, then blend. Add tequila, blend again. Whipped cream on top optional.
Pour in the vodka first and then proceed to pour the beer on top.
Pour all ingredients over ice in a mixing glass, shake, add more Sloe Gin or Blue Curacao to achieve the desired hue of purple. Strain into an old fashioned glass.

Fill 1/3 of the collins glass with cider, then float the Guinness ontop, to bring the volume to 2/3 full. Pour Bushmill's in a separate shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the collins glass and slam it!
Layer in cordial glass.
Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!

drinks.strDrink: Off your ass in a glass
drinks.strInstructions: No organized mixing require. Put all ingredients in a glass, stir, and drink straight. Then you had better lie down.
Combine in a double shot glass and enjoy.
Pour vidka in blender and add ice crem. Blend. Top with lemonade.

Put plenty of ice in glass pour rum and everclear first refill with ice - put your tequila, gin, vodka and your blue curraco in. put your pinapple juice in and shake serve with a lemon slice and cherry

Grenadine will sink to the bottom of the glass. The dash should be just enough to give a thin layer. Mix thoroghly. The correct mix will give a drink which is between pink & orange in color, but exactly NOT one or the other.
Throw it all together and serve real cold.
Fill the glass with the amount of Tia Maria you would like and put an equal amount, or a little more, of milk. Add two ice cubes and down.
Combine over ice, strain into shot glass.
In a glass, put in all liquor and then fill the remaining glass with the kool-aid

take the galliano and fill one third of the glass. then using a table spoon measure out the bayleys and pour onto the galliano, so that they are seperated. finally, clean the spoon, and measure out the coinraux pour onto the bayleys again so that they are seperated. take a match or lighter and light the cointraux, take a straw and place at bottom of glass and drink.
Pour in a big glass. Mix. It's best when it's cold and on the rocks.
Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into shot glasses. Yell your favorite swear word and drink.
First add vodka to lemaonade, sprite goes in last. Stir.

Fill a shot glass half full with the Bailey's and the rest of the way with the Goldschlager. Mix with toothpick. Then sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on the top and light it with a match (it may take a couple of tries to get it to stay lit). Let it burn for a few seconds and gently blow out the flame being careful not to splash the drink out of the glass. Then, drink!
Mix ingrediants.
Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice if desired.
Pour shots in glass and add Sprite to your taste.
Cut lemons into wedges and mix into large container.
Pour a lot of kurant into ice filled glass. Fill with sour mix. Shake, always shake and add a splash of soda. Enjoy.
Add equal parts of Everclear and lemon juice to a shot glass. Place the shot into the freezer for 30 minutes to completely chill it. Drink it ice cold.
In a shaker, mix all ingredients, shake well. Serve over ice, garnish with a lime wedge (optional)
My experience shows that pouring in any order has no bearing on the overall taste of the drink.
Pour first three ingredients. Then pour orange juice until cup is little more than half filled. Then fill the rest of the way with 7-up and stir until well mixed.
Mix the three ingredients in a shot glass and slam
Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass.
Pour gin, then midori, then 7-up (to fill) over ice in a Tom Collins glass. Shake in cocktail shaker, add straw, cherry. Tastes like candy.
Shake and strain. Before serving, moisten the edge of the highball glass and dip in castor sugar.
Shake and serve
Equal parts. All ingredients are measured equally in no particular order.
mix lemonjuice with vodka, fill with ginger ale.
Pour the Sloe Gin and Amaretto into a glass. Fill the Glass 1/2 way with 7-up (Optional), and the other 1/2 with Orange Juice
Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.
Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes. Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.
Add all the ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Then shake,pour into martini glass and add a few cranberries to complete the drink.(Soak the cranberries in vodka first)
Mix rum and orange juice together (stirring) then pour over ice.
Mix together and server in a pitcher
Mix together and server in a pitcher
Now stir vigorously and then pour over a large cup of ice. Now drink it with a straw and stir occasionally.
